name: ve-addon-schematics
subtitle: Vanilla Expansion 模组的蓝图扩展包
author: [sky[]]Momiji142857[white[]]
description:
[#90DBFF[]]Vanilla Expansion原版扩展[white[]]的蓝图附属模组
schematics add‑on for the [#90DBFF[]]Vanilla Expansion[white[]] (VE)

[red[]]需先启用 Vanilla Expansion 模组。
Requires Vanilla Expansion to be enabled.[white[]]

本模组主要收录并优化了来自VE模组交流群的一些蓝图，旨在让玩家能更方便地使用。
This pack collects and optimizes community schematics to make them easier for players to import and use.

感谢所有为本合集贡献并参与测试的成员！
Thank you to everyone who contributed and helped test the pack!

最后更新 / Last updated: 2026-01-11
